DataElement.preferredName: Radiation Therapy Prior Boost Fractionation Administered Count
DataElement.preferredDefinition: the numeric count of fractionated radiation therapy, small, equal doses of treatment of a disease by means of exposure of radiation to a body site or structure delivered over a period of several days, administered prior to a radiation boost, an increase in amount of radiation treatment.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Radiation Therapy Prior Boost Fractionation Administered
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: information related the administration of fractionated radiation therapy, small, equal doses of treatment of a disease by means of exposure of radiation to a body site or structure delivered over a period of several days, prior to a radiation boost, an increase in amount of radiation treatment.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: use PHOTOTHERAPY, LASER THERAPY, or ULTRAVIOLET THERAPY for therapeutic radiation with visible, laser, or ultraviolet light, respectively.

Concepts.definition: Treatment of a disease by means of exposure of the target or the whole body to radiation. Radiation therapy is often used as part of curative therapy and occasionally as a component of palliative treatment for cancer. Other uses include total body irradiation prior to transplantation.

Property.preferredDefinition: Earlier in time or order.:Boost; increase or raise.:Dividing the total dose of radiation therapy into several smaller, equal doses delivered over a period of several days.:Given.

Concepts.definition: Radiation therapy in which the total dose delivered is divided into several smaller, equal doses delivered over a period of several days.
The act of having given something (e.g., a medication or test).

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: actions or administration of therapeutic agents to produce an effect that is intended to alter the course of a pathologic process (NCI).

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: The quantity of the specified item.

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: To determine the number or amount of something; the result of this activity.

Concepts.definition: Determining the number or amount of something.

ValueDomain.changeDescription: 8/11/17 tt transferred context, added reg status and CSI per Round 5 finalization task.
